resources.string: Click the \'plus\' icon to add an event

CountaDay was created by Brendan Kenny and Eric Hunt for an Android Development class at the Rochester Institute of Technology. 
 
This app is designed to help its user keep track of different events happening in their life. Users are able to either keep track of the days since an event took place, as well as the number of days until an event occurs. 
 
Please enjoy our app!

Click the 'plus' icon to add an event to either the countdown or countup feature. 

Click on an event to edit it's properties. 

Long press on an event to delete it.
